definitions.definition: A spoken lesson or exposition , usually delivered to a group .
examples: During class today the professor delivered an interesting lecture .

definitions.definition: A class that primarily consists of a (weekly or other regularly held) lecture (as in sense 1), usually at college or university.
examples: We will not have lecture tomorrow.

definitions.definition: A berating or scolding , especially if lengthy, formal or given in a stern or angry manner.
examples: I really don't want you to give me a lecture about my bad eating habits.

main_definition: A spoken lesson or exposition , usually delivered to a group .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A class that primarily consists of a (weekly or other regularly held) lecture (as in sense 1), usually at college or university.
A berating or scolding , especially if lengthy, formal or given in a stern or angry manner.
